item.description:
Let's go see the comedy Admission starring Tina Fey and Paul Rudd. We will meet in the lobby of the theater.

Here's a brief summary:

Straight-laced Princeton University admissions officer Portia Nathan (Tina Fey) is caught off-guard when she makes a recruiting visit to an alternative high school overseen by her former college classmate, the free-wheeling John Pressman (Paul Rudd). Pressman has surmised that Jeremiah, his gifted yet very unconventional student, might well be the son that Portia secretly gave up for adoption many years ago. Soon, Portia finds herself bending the rules for Jeremiah, putting at risk the life she thought she always wanted -- but in the process finding her way to a surprising and exhilarating life and romance she never dreamed of having.

I am both a big Tina Fey and Paul Rudd fan and this look likes a funny movie.

Here is the trailer: http://movies.yahoo.com/movie/admission/

Hollywood Hits: http://www.hhdt.com/index.asp

We will be seeing the 7pm show.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the front lobby area
item.name: North Shore Wednesday Night Movie, Danvers MA: Admission
